response.overview: A long, long time ago, a crown prince is guided to a mysterious cave where a hermit tells him a prophecy on his love life - he will have two confidantes, with one like the sun and the other like the moon. After walking out of the cave, the crown prince runs into an attractive lady who said she met him before at the Lantern Festival gathering and that she would only marry him in this life. The crown prince turns the lady down, but little does he know she’s actually the daughter of the Grand Chancellor. Meanwhile, the prince’s uncle introduced another beauty to the prince with the evil intention to use her to control him…
response.title: Queen of My Heart

results.name: Official Trailer: Queen of My Heart | 温暖的皇妃 | iQiyi
